channel.title: Projects on Jean Bégaint
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Jean Bégaint

item.title: PhD Thesis
item.description: In this thesis, we study novel approaches to the image and video compression domain. Recent applications such as cloud-based image compression and new tools for temporal-prediction in video compression are studied. Related publications Region Based Prediction for Image Compression in the Cloud (TIP 2017) Locally-weighted template-matching based prediction for … (DCC 2016) Related Patents 1 undisclosed patent
